name: Policy_Doc_Report
query: SELECT tsp.name AS Sr_No, subquery.po_no AS Policy_No, tsp.po_name AS Policy_Name, CONCAT('', SUBSTRING_INDEX(tsp.att_file, '/', -1), '') AS File, tsp.remarks AS Remarks FROM `tabVG_Policy` tsp JOIN (SELECT po_name, MAX(po_no) AS po_no FROM `tabVG_Policy` GROUP BY po_name) AS subquery ON tsp.po_name = subquery.po_name AND tsp.po_no = subquery.po_no ORDER BY tsp.po_no DESC;
